boardgame.name: Inhabit the Earth
boardgame.description: Inhabit the Earth is a race game played on six continent boards. Players create their own menagerie of up to six creatures, each of which is represented by up to six cards, by using cards to introduce, multiply, evolve, and adapt their creatures. Each of the 162 unique cards identifies a creature's class, a continent and terrain that the creature inhabits, and a special or scoring ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each class of creature is also represented by a counter, and the cards are also used to trigger the movement of the counters along the trails on the boards and by migrating, from one board to another. Breeding, achieved by flipping over a creature's counter, generates new cards. Movement facilitates further breeding and the chance to secure tokens for additional icons and point scoring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the game, points are scored through abilities on the creature's cards, the position of the creatures' counters on the boards, and from tokens; the player with the most points wins. Rules for an introductory game for up to three players are included._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Like new, played twice. Box and components are in excellent shape. Box has some minor shelf wear. Cards are sleeved. Includes replacement tile holders released at Essen 2016.

The latest from another veteran Brit, this is a race game as players compete to introduce their set of creatures across all six continents. Veteran gamers will recognise that the cover is a homage to the classic Wildlife Adventure. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £23.33 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £4.30 (myHermes, takes 3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £14.76 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £12.30 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £19.60 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £18.05 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
